org.osate.aadl2

Interface AccessSpecification

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AObject, Element, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, FeaturePrototypeActual, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccessSpecificationImpl

    public interface AccessSpecification
extends FeaturePrototypeActual
    A representation of the model object 'Access Specification'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Kind
    • Category
    • Classifier

    See Also:
    Aadl2Package.getAccessSpecification()
